metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16369 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description: XRef::fetch in XRef.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted pdf file, related toAcroForm::scanField, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. NOTE: this might overlapCVE-2018-7453.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
